Title: 069: Steps on How To Become a Thought Leader in the Field of Data Science
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Data and Analytics Recruiter for FutureYou Executive Recruitment, Caroline McColl. You’ll learn how to build up the courage and not be afraid to ask questions when you most need to, know what the 10 Steps to Thought Leadership are, and finally learn about the value of presentation skills for Data Scientists.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/69
